tasks.label: build active file (C/C++)
args: if not exist "${fileDirname}\exe files" mkdir "${fileDirname}\exe files" && (if "%fileExtname%"==".c" ("C:\MinGW\bin\gcc.exe" -fdiagnostics-color=always -g "%file%" -o "${fileDirname}\exe files\${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe") else ("C:\MinGW\bin\g++.exe" -fdiagnostics-color=always -g "%file%" -o "${fileDirname}\exe files\${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe"))
tasks.detail: Automatically builds both .c and .cpp files into the 'exe files' folder (creates it if missing).
